message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a chance to purchase my product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. Can you meet me halfway?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,500 is a tempting offer, I believe this product has significant value and I can't go below $13,500. This is my final offer.
I understand your perspective, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I can offer $13,000. Can we compromise at this price?
